00039 /**********************************************************/
00040 /* factGetVarPN1Call: This structure is used to store the */
00041 /*   arguments to the most general extraction routine for */
00042 /*   retrieving a variable from the fact pattern network. */
00043 /**********************************************************/
00044 struct factGetVarPN1Call
00045   {
00046    unsigned int factAddress : 1;
00047    unsigned int allFields : 1;
00048    unsigned short whichField;
00049    unsigned short whichSlot;
00050   };
00051 
00052 /***********************************************************/
00053 /* factGetVarPN2Call: This structure is used to store the  */
00054 /*   arguments to the most specific extraction routine for */
00055 /*   retrieving a variable from the fact pattern network.  */
00056 /*   It is used for retrieving the single value stored in  */
00057 /*   a single field slot (the slot index can be used to    */
00058 /*   directly to retrieve the value from the fact array).  */
00059 /***********************************************************/
00060 struct factGetVarPN2Call
00061   {
00062    unsigned short whichSlot;
00063   };
00064 
00065 /**********************************************************/
00066 /* factGetVarPN3Call:  */
00067 /**********************************************************/
00068 struct factGetVarPN3Call
00069   {
00070    unsigned int fromBeginning : 1;
00071    unsigned int fromEnd : 1;
00072    unsigned short beginOffset;
00073    unsigned short endOffset;
00074    unsigned short whichSlot;
00075   };
00076 
00077 /**************************************************************/
00078 /* factConstantPN1Call: Used for testing for a constant value */
00079 /*   in the fact pattern network. Compare the value of a      */
00080 /*   single field slot to a constant.                         */
00081 /**************************************************************/
00082 struct factConstantPN1Call
00083   {
00084    unsigned int testForEquality : 1;
00085    unsigned short whichSlot;
00086   };
00087 
00088 /******************************************************************/
00089 /* factConstantPN2Call: Used for testing for a constant value in  */
00090 /*   the fact pattern network. Compare the value of a multifield  */
00091 /*   slot to a constant (where the value retrieved for comparison */
00092 /*   from the slot contains no multifields before or only one     */
00093 /*   multifield before and none after).                           */
00094 /******************************************************************/
00095 struct factConstantPN2Call
00096   {
00097    unsigned int testForEquality : 1;
00098    unsigned int fromBeginning : 1;
00099    unsigned short offset;
00100    unsigned short whichSlot;
00101   };
00102 
00103 /**********************************************************/
00104 /* factGetVarJN1Call: This structure is used to store the */
00105 /*   arguments to the most general extraction routine for */
00106 /*   retrieving a fact variable from the join network.    */
00107 /**********************************************************/
00108 struct factGetVarJN1Call
00109   {
00110    unsigned int factAddress : 1;
00111    unsigned int allFields : 1;
00112    unsigned int lhs : 1;
00113    unsigned int rhs : 1;
00114    unsigned short whichPattern;
00115    unsigned short whichSlot;
00116    unsigned short whichField;
00117   };
00118

00127    unsigned short whichSlot;

00194 /**********************************************************/
00195 /* factCheckLengthPNCall: This structure is used to store */
00196 /*   the  arguments to the routine for determining if the */
00197 /*   length of a multifield slot is equal or greater than */
00198 /*   a specified value.                                   */
00199 /**********************************************************/
00200 
00201 struct factCheckLengthPNCall
00202   {
00203     unsigned int exactly : 1;
00204     unsigned short minLength;
00205     unsigned short whichSlot;
00206   };
